+ _3 Titles and Footnotes Specifications_
  + 3.1 Titles and footntoes can be manually entered:
    + 3.1.1 In the RTF document creation
    + 3.1.2 Using add_titles/add_footnotes
    + 3.1.3 Importing from a separate file using a reader
  + 3.2 Keywords for titles and footnotes work properly
    + 3.2.1 PAGE_FORMAT:
    + 3.2.2 DATE_FORMAT:
    + 3.2.3 FILE_PATH:
  + 3.3 Attributes update correctly when specified
    + 3.3.1 Bold
    + 3.3.2 Italic
    + 3.3.3 Alignment
      + 3.3.3.1 Split titles/footnotes flush left and right as expected
    + 3.3.4 Font
    + 3.3.5 Font size
    + 3.3.6 Index
      + 3.3.6.1 Specified indices sort appropriately when entered in separte orders
      + NULL indices sort last
  + 3.4 View functions (i.e. view_titles and view_footnotes) render data frames appropriately
